item.title: RH 10-K
item.description: RH, which is in the Retail-Furniture Stores [5712] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 30, 2021 had 74336 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 729 instances million - 622 instances 2020 - 602 instances may - 598 instances stock - 520 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
